__construct.name: __construct
__construct.summary: This will call the initial build a new instance. It should be called only once from within the script. All subsequent calls to controllers should be done through $this->add($path).

reset.name: reset

getRequest.name: getRequest
getRequest.summary: Returns the current controller's route, i.e as demanded by the client.

sayRoot.name: sayRoot
sayRoot.summary: Returns the current controller's root drrectory.

getController.name: getController
getController.summary: Returns the current controller's file's name.

getCurrentDir.name: getCurrentDir
getCurrentDir.summary: Returns the current controller's file's name.

render.name: render
render.summary: This directly renders content with arbitrary values using the existing Mustache engine.

arguments.name: view
arguments.description: The data model to fill the view with

isCli.name: isCli
isCli.summary: Returns true if called from CLI/Cron, false otherwise

reroute.name: reroute
reroute.summary: This will reroute a controller to another one seemlessly. Chainable

incl.name: incl
incl.summary: This will include a file from within the controller's path. Chainable

addScript.name: addScript
addScript.summary: This will add the given string to the script property, and create it if needed. Chainable

registerPluginClasses.name: registerPluginClasses

process.name: process
process.summary: This will launch the controller in a new function.
process.description: It is publicly launched through check().

getJs.name: getJs
getJs.summary: This will get a javascript view encapsulated in an anonymous function for embedding in HTML.

getJsGroup.name: getJsGroup
getJsGroup.summary: This will get a javascript view encapsulated in an anonymous function for embedding in HTML.

getViewGroup.name: getViewGroup
getViewGroup.summary: This will get a javascript view encapsulated in an anonymous function for embedding in HTML.

getCss.name: getCss
getCss.summary: This will get a CSS view encapsulated in a scoped style tag.

getLess.name: getLess
getLess.summary: This will get and compile a LESS view encapsulated in a scoped style tag.

addCss.name: addCss
addCss.summary: This will get a CSS view encapsulated in a scoped style tag.

addLess.name: addLess
addLess.summary: This will get and compile a LESS view encapsulated in a scoped style tag.

addJs.name: addJs
addJs.summary: This will add a javascript view to $this->obj->script

addJsGroup.name: addJsGroup
addJsGroup.summary: This will add a javascript view to $this->obj->script

setColor.name: setColor

getPluginFromComponent.name: getPluginFromComponent
getPluginFromComponent.summary: Retrieves the plugin's name from the component's name if any

getComponent.name: getComponent

jsData.name: jsData

getView.name: getView

customPluginView.name: customPluginView

combo.name: combo
combo.summary: Compile and echoes all the views with the given data

arguments.name: title
arguments.description: The data, if true the path' model will be used

arguments.name: data
arguments.description: The time-to-live value if cache must be used for the model

arguments.name: ttl
arguments.description: The path for the views/model; if null the controller path will be used

getContent.name: getContent
getContent.summary: This will get a the content of a file located within the data path

getDir.name: getDir
getDir.summary: This will return the path to the directory of the current controller

setPrepath.name: setPrepath

getModel.name: getModel
getModel.summary: This will get the model. There is no order for the arguments.

getCachedModel.name: getCachedModel
getCachedModel.summary: This will get the model. There is no order for the arguments.

deleteCachedModel.name: deleteCachedModel
deleteCachedModel.summary: This will delete the cached model. There is no order for the arguments.

setCachedModel.name: setCachedModel
setCachedModel.summary: This will get the model. There is no order for the arguments.

getObjectModel.name: getObjectModel

addInc.name: addInc
addInc.summary: Adds a property to the MVC object inc if it has not been declared.

hasArguments.name: hasArguments

hasData.name: hasData
hasData.summary: Checks if data exists or if a specific index exists in the data

hasContent.name: hasContent
hasContent.summary: Checks if there is ny HTML content in the object

getRendered.name: getRendered
getRendered.summary: Returns the rendered result from the current mvc if successufully processed
getRendered.description: process() (or check()) must have been called before.

description_parts.content: process() (or check()) must have been called before.

getScript.name: getScript
getScript.summary: Returns the rendered result from the current mvc if successufully processed
getScript.description: process() (or check()) must have been called before.

description_parts.content: process() (or check()) must have been called before.

setData.name: setData
setData.summary: Sets the data. Chainable. Should be useless as $this->data is public. Chainable.

addData.name: addData
addData.summary: Merges the existing data if there is with this one. Chainable.

add.name: add
add.summary: Merges the existing data if there is with this one. Chainable.

addToObj.name: addToObj
addToObj.summary: Merges the existing data if there is with this one. Chainable.

viewExists.name: viewExists
viewExists.summary: Checks whether the given view exists or not.

modelExists.name: modelExists
modelExists.summary: Checks whether the given model exists or not.

pluginDataPath.name: pluginDataPath

doc.description: The db connection if accepted by the mvc class.

tags.description: The mode of the controller (dom, cli...), which will determine its route

doc.description: All the parts of the path requested
All the parts of the path requested which are not part of the controller path
A numeric indexed array of the files sent through POST (different from native)
An external object that can be filled after the object creation and can be used as a global with the function add_inc
